name: logs together
description:
NOTE: for some reasons the colors in windows look weird. Imagine the game looking like in the screenshot :]

Logs together is multiplayer game played by two players on one PC (with a bit of skill, even playable by one person) made in 48 hours for the gmtk game jam. Your goal is to collect logs with a string that is between you and your friend. Beware! There are saws, trees and piles of logs waiting for you to hit them. If you do so you die. Not even your string is immune.

HOW TO PLAY:

Catch rolling logs with the string between the two players. Don't touch anything else. Not even with the string.

CONTROLS:

player 1: WASD

player 2: arrows

Music: House in a forest by Horror Pen

Source code: https://github.com/marekmaskarinec/jam-submissions/tree/main/connected
